column4: Lucid Motors names former Tesla Model S chief engineer as CEO
column5: Electric carmaker Lucid Motors on Tuesday named Peter Rawlinson  former chief engineer of Tesla Inc's Model S  as its chief executive officer  effective immediately.

column4: Lucid Motors names former Tesla Model S chief engineer as CEO
column5: April 23 Electric carmaker Lucid Motors on Tuesday named Peter Rawlinson  former chief engineer of Tesla Inc's Model S  as its chief executive officer  effective immediately.

column4: Elon Musk on Tesla's self-driving capabilities
column5: Tesla Inc revealed its self-driving plans during an investor day on Monday  with Chief Executive Elon Musk predicting the launch of an autonomous robotaxi service next year in some U.S. markets. | Video

column4: Tesla says robotaxis coming to U.S. roads next year  slams rivals' use of Lidar
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Chief Executive Elon Musk said Tesla Inc robotaxis with no human drivers would be available in some U.S. markets next year  continuing a habit of bold pronouncements that have excited many investors while often missing deadlines. | Video
